# setPassword(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the password from the supplied string.

## Declaration

```swift
func setPassword(_ password: String) throws
```

## Parameters

- **password**: The password.

## Discussion

Use this function to encrypt or decrypt an archive with the [doc://com.apple.applearchive/documentation/AppleArchive/ArchiveEncryptionContext/EncryptionMode-swift.struct/scrypt] encryption mode.

## Setting a password

- **password**: The password used to encrypt or decrypt an archive.
- **generatePassword()**: Generates a new password.

items.description: The password used to encrypt or decrypt an archive.
